comments:
3.3 M4

I have a project created via the plug-in from jar file wizard. The option to extract the jar file checked.

If I right click on such a project and select PDE Tools -> Organize Manifest... I cannot continue because pressing the Finish button has no effect. An investigation of the log file showed that an error was logged.

So actually, there are two problems here. 

First, the error is not reported in UI. At least a dialog should pop up indicating a problem during execution of the organize manifest operation.

Second, here is the stack trace of the error:

Error
Tue Jan 09 12:07:37 CET 2007
Path must include project and resource name: /com.google.gwt.user

I think the exception is thrown because in a plug-in created from a jar file the classes are located in the project instead of a folder (the package fragment root is the project).
The log entry looks like bug 168181.
Indeed, I noticed a similar exception thrown by the manifest builder.

Hi Gunnar,

I successfully reproduced the problem you encountered using 3.3 M4.

I am unable to reproduce the problem you encountered using I20070110-1600.
So I believe that Chris' fix for Bug # 168181 also solves your problem.

Please try it out and reopen this bug if you still see a problem.
